jobsJson.descriptionPlain: The Data Infrastructure engineer in BI is a hybrid role: part of the developer and part of the Infrastructure Engineer Expert. As an engineer in BI, you will work intensively with data. The focus of the Data Infrastructure Engineer is building and maintaining infrastructure and make a continuous improvement of the existing BI environment.

jobsJson.additionalPlain:
Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!

lists.content:
• Work on automation and help engineering succeed by supporting infrastructure
  • Plan, design, execute and maintain infrastructure in BI environment
  • OnCall support on rotation with the team for production monitoring and debug production issues across services
  • Manage our infrastructure with Chef, Terraform, Ansible, Docker, Google Deployment Manager, and/or Kubernetes
  • Plan the growth of BI infrastructure
  • Make monitoring and alerting alert based on symptoms and not on outages
  • Document every action so your learnings turn into repeatable actions and then into automation and also improve the deployment process to make it as boring as possible
  • Develop data processing applications based on the existing pattern

• Hands-on experience with data pipeline tools such as Airflow, Luigi, Azkaban, Oozie
  • Have an understanding of SQL and know your way around Linux and the Unix Shell
  • Experience with infrastructure automation and configuration management using tools such as Chef, Ansible, Puppet, Terraform, Docker, Google Cloud Manager, and Kubernetes
  • Have the ability to orchestrate and automate complex administrative tasks with the urge to document all things
  • Experience with programming in a software engineering role and/or data analytics or data warehousing role
  • Passion for stable and secure systems management practices
  • Have a proactive, go-for-it attitude. When you see something broken, you can't help but fix it
  • Have an urge for delivering quickly and iterating fast
